text: Constantine is a 2005 American superhero horror movie starring Keanu Reeves and Rachel Weisz. It is based on a comic book series called Hellblazer. The main character, John Constantine, fights demons. ==Other websites== * Category:2005 fantasy movies Category:2005 horror movies Category:2000s superhero movies Category:2000s American fantasy movies Category:American science fiction horror movies Category:Movies about demons Category:Movies about exorcism Category:Cancer in movies Category:2000s English-language movies Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:DC Comics movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:2000s apocalyptic movies Category:American superhero movies
title: Constantine (movie)
